feature_1_description: This feature evaluates the core beliefs and values that drive the main characters and the overarching themes of the films.
feature_2_description: This feature assesses the motivations driving the main characters' actions throughout the story.
feature_3_description: This feature examines the interactions and relationships between characters and their social environments.
feature_4_description: This feature looks at the overall structure and progression of the narrative.

feature_1_description: Differences in core philosophical and ideological foundations.
feature_2_description: Varied character motivations aligned with the themes of romance versus adventure.
feature_3_description: Interaction patterns among characters within different societal structures.
feature_4_description: Emotional and transformational journeys of characters.
